name: .PAW File Extension
summary: Learn about .PAW files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created in the pawaaFILE format, a format developed by Pawaa Software for secure storage and transmission of files, particularly in enterprise environments; encapsulates any file with an encryption layer and a usage policy so that the file is protected from unwanted access; also enforces audit trails and expiration dates so the file has additional levels of distribution control.

content: Pawaa Software products that are designed for use with the pawaaFILE format integrate with any enterprise application, including Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Adobe Acrobat, and others. In each application, users can save a document as a PAW file and then securely transmit it to recipients via email or a company network.
NOTE: SecurelyShare is no longer developed and has been discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
